Name: jwing - the next puzzle game
About the game: jwing - the next puzzle game Drop weighted coloured balls onto scales, matching three or more balls horizontally in order to score points. But be careful, as the scales adjust to the weight on them, they can tip changing the field to your advantage, detriment or worse - a game over : when the piles of balls become too high they collapse, ending the game. jwing 1.2 includes jwing couch multiplayer. New in 1.2, battle against a friend or family member in couch multiplayer mode. jwing puzzle. New in 1.1, in puzzle mode the aim is to clear the balls on and above the line to progress to the next level. jwing original. The original jwing experience. Match three or more balls to gain points and chase the high score in a marathon mode. unlockable features Earn in game money in jwing original and puzzle game play which can be used to unlock new ball types to help you achieve a higher score and level. Black Holes Laser Balls Magic Balls Magnetic Balls Colour Void Saviour Ball Electric Balls
